title: OPL Live from a Sydney Bar!
body:
Hey Guys
Just letting you guys know that Spawn Point Small bar will be hosting an event to watch all the Oceanic teams play live next week!
We are based in Sydney CBD and have room for approx 60 League loving fans!
Unfortunately we are an 18+ Venue so sorry for all the youngsters.
We are on Clarence Street in Sydney but look up Spawn Point Small Bar for more information on the event!

Hope to see you guys there
Kirby

replies.body: Hey, is this on every week? Or just for the first one?
